title.rendered: NMIMS Batch Planner – Jan 2022 Academic Cycle – Online Live Sessions

content.rendered:
MBA Distance and Diploma Semester 1

(Track 1 – Slow Track – Weekend)

  • Start Date: November 20, 2021
  • Days: 2 Sessions on Saturday and 2 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings on Saturdays: 4.30 PM to 6.30 PM, 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM, 11.30 AM to 1.30 PM

(Track 2 – Slow Track – Weekday)

  • Start Date: December 20, 2021
  • Days: Monday to Friday
  • Timings: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM

 (Track 3 – Slow Track – Weekend)

  • Start Date: January 07, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Friday, 2 Sessions on Saturday and 2 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings on Fridays: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Saturdays: 4.30 PM to 6.30 PM, 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM, 11.30 AM to 1.30 PM

 (Track 4 – Fast Track – Weekend)

  • Start Date: February 05, 2022
  • Days: 3 Sessions on Saturday and 3 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings on Saturdays: 2.00 PM to 4.00 PM, 4.30 PM to 6.30 PM, 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM, 11.30 AM to 1.30 PM, 2.00 PM to 4.00 PM

(Track 5 – Fast Track – All Week)

  • Start Date: March 14, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Monday to Saturday, 1 Session on Friday, 1 Session on Saturday and 1 Session on Sunday
  • Timings on Monday to Saturday: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Fridays: 7.00 AM to 9.00 AM
  • Timings on Saturdays: 7.00 AM to 9.00 AM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM

BBA and B.COM Semester 1

(Batch 1 – Slow Track – Weekday)

  • Start Date: January 31, 2022
  • Days: Monday to Saturday and occasionally on Sundays – 2 sessions every day
  • Timings: 7.30 AM to 9.00 AM, 9.30 AM to 11.00 AM
  • Please See: In case of Holiday / Cancellation of the sessions, the said sessions will be adjusted in the evening slot 7.30 PM on Weekday (Monday to Saturday)
  • Note: Employability Skills Session will be held on Sundays

(Batch 2 – Slow Track – Weekday)

  • Start Date: To be decided
  • Days: To be decided
  • Timings: To be decided

BBA and B.COM Semester 2 and 3 (Slow Track – Weekday)

  • Start Date: February 07, 2022
  • Days: Monday to Saturday and occasionally on Sundays – 2 sessions every day
  • Timings: 7.30 AM to 9.00 AM, 9.30 AM to 11.00 AM
  • Please See: In case of Holiday / Cancellation of the sessions, the said sessions will be adjusted in the evening slot 7.30 PM on Weekday (Monday to Saturday)
  • Note: Employability Skills Session will be held on Sundays

PG Diploma and MBA Distance Semester 2

(Weekday)

  • Start Date: January 07, 2022
  • Days: Monday to Friday
  • Timings: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Please See: In case of shortfall of Slots / Holiday / Cancellation, the sessions will be conducted on Saturday / Sunday

(Weekend)

  • Start Date: January 17, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Friday, 2 Sessions on Saturday and 3 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings on Fridays: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Saturdays: 4.30 PM to 6.30 PM, 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM, 11.30 AM to 1.30 PM, 2.00 PM to 4.00 PM

(Fast Track – All Week)

  • Start Date: March 14, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Monday to Saturday, 1 Session on Friday, 1 Session on Saturday and 1 Session on Sunday
  • Timings on Monday to Saturday: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Timings on Fridays: 7.00 AM to 9.00 AM
  • Timings on Saturdays: 7.00 AM to 9.00 AM
  • Timings on Sundays: 9.00 AM to 11.00 AM

PG Diploma Semesters 3 and 4 and Diploma Semester 2

(Weekend Only)

  • Start Date: February 04, 2022 TENTATIVELY
  • Days: Friday, Saturday and Sunday
  • Timings: As per Schedule in Academic Calendar
  • Please See: In case of shortfall of Slots / Holiday / Cancellation, the sessions will be conducted on the remaining Weekdays
  • Note: Some programs may have 3 sessions on Saturdays or Sundays for common Courses

MSc. Applied Finance Term 1

(Weekday Only)

  • Start Date: January 31, 2022
  • Days: Monday to Friday
  • Timings: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Please See: In case of shortfall of Slots / Holiday / Cancellation, the sessions will be conducted on Saturday / Sunday

MSc. Applied Finance Terms 2, 3 and 4

(Weekday Only)

  • Start Date: February 07, 2022
  • Days: Monday to Friday
  • Timings: 7.00 PM to 9.00 PM
  • Please See: In case of shortfall of Slots / Holiday / Cancellation, the sessions will be conducted on Saturday / Sunday

Professional Diploma (Digital Marketing) and Professional Diploma (Wealth Management) Term 1 (Weekend Only)

  • Start Date: January 29, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Friday, 2 Sessions on Saturday and 2 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings: As per schedule in Academic Calendar

Professional Diploma (Digital Marketing) and Professional Diploma (Wealth Management) Term 2 (Weekend Only)

  • Start Date: February 05, 2022
  • Days: 1 Session on Friday, 2 Sessions on Saturday and 2 Sessions on Sunday
  • Timings: As per schedule in Academic Calendar

Certificate Courses (Weekend Only)

  • Start Date: January 29, 2022
  • Days: Friday, Saturday and Sunday
  • Timings: As per schedule in Academic Calendar
  • Please See: In case of shortfall of Slots / Holiday / Cancellation, the sessions will be conducted on the remaining Weekdays
Certificate Course in Business Management Schedule is same as MBA Distance Semester 1
